name: Steel Framed Buildings
short_description: Solid Steel Buildings, Inc. is an all-encompassing Steel Building Solution provider.  Our methodology will provide you with a low cost steel building with the highest possible quality.  Solid Steel Buildings will confidently supply you with a metal building solution from the steel building design, manufacturing and installation phases.  Our well-seasoned professionals specialize in metal building construction which enables our customers to buy with confidence that they will have a low cost solution.
